title: Đom Đóm (萤火)
lyrics: Qing ying shan yao zhe. Ta cheng zhe feng deng ri luo xia shan po Lian shang xia ye sen lin de mo lu se Xiang yan huo kan xi kuang huan que qiao ran sheng kai ji mo Du zi fa guang de Bu zai yao yuan yin he zhuan dong zhe Wu lun kuai le huo nan guo Cheng qun de shuo hu wo Pei ban zhe chang guo tong nian Wu shu de ge Er shang da yi hou Ren hai xiong gong Sen lin ye bei cheng shi ti huan gao luo chong chong Er shang da yi hou Mong zhong fei wu de ying huo chong Cang zai wo de shen ti Pei wo zou meng Wo xiang xin ai shi Ying huo ban de guang mang Zai hei ye li mi lu de ren Cai neng zhao dao fang xiang Wo zhu xi wang Ba xing xing dou zhuang jin xing nang Jiu bu hui hai ba gu dan liu lang Wo xiang xin ai shi Ying huo ban de xin yang Zai jue wang li qian cheng de ren Jiu neng zhang chu chi bang Bao zhu meng xiang Xiang hai zi ban dan chun shan liang Ran hou fei xiang geng yao yuan di di fang. Er shang da yi hou Ren hai xiong gong Sen lin ye bei cheng shi ti huan gao luo chong chong Er shang da yi hou Mong zhong fei wu de ying huo chong Cang zai wo de shen ti Pei wo zou meng Wo xiang xin ai shi Ying huo ban de guang mang Zai hei ye li mi lu de ren Cai neng zhao dao fang xiang Wo zhu xi wang Ba xing xing dou zhuang jin xing nang Jiu bu hui hai ba gu dan liu lang Wo xiang xin ai shi Ying huo ban de xin yang Zai jue wang li qian cheng de ren Jiu neng zhang chu chi bang Bao zhu meng xiang Xiang hai zi ban dan chun shan liang Ran hou fei xiang geng yao yuan di di fang. Jiu suan mei tai yang wo ye neng fa guang Shi ni rang wo bian de bu yi yang Qing ying de fei wu de Liu lang de yi ran shan liang Yuan lai zui yuan di fang shi ni de shen pang. Wo xiang xin ai shi Ying huo ban de guang mang Zai hei ye li mi lu de ren Cai neng zhao dao fang xiang Wo zhu xi wang Ba xing xing dou zhuang jin xing nang Jiu bu hui hai ba gu dan liu lang Wo yong yuan xiang xin Ying huo ban de xin yang Rang jue wang li qian cheng de ren Dou zhang chu le chi bang Bao zhu meng xiang hai zi ban dan chun shan liang Wo hui bu hui fei xiang yeng yuan di fang. Ni hui pei zhe wo fei xiang Ren he di fang.
